description: This file defines a React functional component named ConnectJiraButton that provides a UI button to initiate the Jira OAuth authorization flow. It manages user interaction, fetches the OAuth URL from a backend service, and handles navigation or error scenarios.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button to start Jira OAuth authorization process.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the button click event, fetches the authorization URL, and redirects the browser.
